content.title: Retrograde Common Femoral Artery Access
content.description: Standard arterial access technique for most endovascular interventions, utilizing the common femoral artery with ultrasound or fluoroscopic guidance.

anatomy.target: CFA over femoral head, above profunda origin
anatomy.boundaries: Above: EIA (calcified, difficult to compress), Below: bifurcation (PSA risk)

technique.ultrasound: Real-time guidance recommended, improves first-pass success
